summary: Patches inconsistencies between Requiem and One With Nature, with support for Requiem Minor Arcana and Requiem Behind the Curtain
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#1e84cc][size=4]What does this mod do?
[/size][/color][/b]
It makes [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54090/?]One With Nature[/url] compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url] while offering support for popular Requiem additions [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72865/?]Minor Arcana[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74330/?]Behind the Curtain[/url].

[color=#1e84cc][size=4]Which file do I need?[/size][/color]

There's a FoMod allowing you to choose between basic Requiem + One With Nature, Requiem + One With Nature + Minor Arcana, and Requiem + One With Nature + Behind the Curtain.

If you use both Behind the Curtain and Minor Arcana you don't need to download the Behind the Curtain patch. BTC only makes two changes to animals, both slaughterfish, so loading Behind the Curtain after Minor Arcana but before my patch will retain the proper values for both BTC and also One with Nature.

[color=#1e84cc][size=4]What's my load order?[/size][/color]

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Dawnguard.esm
HearthFires.esm
Dragonborn.esm
Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch.esp
One With Nature.esp
Requiem.esp
Requiem - Bugsmasher Edition.esp
Requiem_Minor_Arcana.esp (If applicable)
Requiem - Behind the Curtain.esp (If applicable)
Requiem - SkyTEST.esp ([b]Only if you downloaded my optional patch, otherwise you'll overwrite records in this patch[/b])
Requiem - One With Nature.esp
Requiem for the Indifferent.esp
author: vram1974

files.name: Requiem One With Nature SkyTEST Realistic Animals and Predators Patch
